AddTagsToResource.name: AddTagsToResource
AddTagsToResource.description: Grants permission to add metadata tags to DMS resources, including replication instances, endpoints, security groups, and migration tasks

ApplyPendingMaintenanceAction.name: ApplyPendingMaintenanceAction
ApplyPendingMaintenanceAction.description: Grants permission to apply a pending maintenance action to a resource (for example, to a replication instance)

AssociateExtensionPack.name: AssociateExtensionPack
AssociateExtensionPack.description: Grants permission to associate a extension pack

BatchStartRecommendations.name: BatchStartRecommendations
BatchStartRecommendations.description: Grants permission to start the analysis of up to 20 source databases to recommend target engines for each source database

CancelMetadataModelAssessment.name: CancelMetadataModelAssessment
CancelMetadataModelAssessment.description: Grants permission to cancel a single metadata model assessment run

CancelMetadataModelConversion.name: CancelMetadataModelConversion
CancelMetadataModelConversion.description: Grants permission to cancel a single metadata model conversion run

CancelMetadataModelExport.name: CancelMetadataModelExport
CancelMetadataModelExport.description: Grants permission to cancel a single metadata model export run

CancelReplicationTaskAssessmentRun.name: CancelReplicationTaskAssessmentRun
CancelReplicationTaskAssessmentRun.description: Grants permission to cancel a single premigration assessment run

CreateDataMigration.name: CreateDataMigration
CreateDataMigration.description: Grants permission to create a database migration using the provided settings

CreateDataProvider.name: CreateDataProvider
CreateDataProvider.description: Grants permission to create an data provider using the provided settings

CreateEndpoint.name: CreateEndpoint
CreateEndpoint.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint using the provided settings

CreateEventSubscription.name: CreateEventSubscription
CreateEventSubscription.description: Grants permission to create an AWS DMS event notification subscription

CreateFleetAdvisorCollector.name: CreateFleetAdvisorCollector
CreateFleetAdvisorCollector.description: Grants permission to create a Fleet Advisor collector using the specified parameters

CreateInstanceProfile.name: CreateInstanceProfile
CreateInstanceProfile.description: Grants permission to create an instance profile using the provided settings

CreateMigrationProject.name: CreateMigrationProject
CreateMigrationProject.description: Grants permission to create an migration project using the provided settings

CreateReplicationConfig.name: CreateReplicationConfig
CreateReplicationConfig.description: Grants permission to create a replication config using the provided settings

CreateReplicationInstance.name: CreateReplicationInstance
CreateReplicationInstance.description: Grants permission to create a replication instance using the specified parameters

CreateReplicationSubnetGroup.name: CreateReplicationSubnetGroup
CreateReplicationSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to create a replication subnet group given a list of the subnet IDs in a VPC

CreateReplicationTask.name: CreateReplicationTask
CreateReplicationTask.description: Grants permission to create a replication task using the specified parameters

DeleteCertificate.name: DeleteCertificate
DeleteCertificate.description: Grants permission to delete the specified certificate

DeleteConnection.name: DeleteConnection
DeleteConnection.description: Grants permission to delete the specified connection between a replication instance and an endpoint

DeleteDataMigration.name: DeleteDataMigration
DeleteDataMigration.description: Grants permission to delete the specified database migration

DeleteDataProvider.name: DeleteDataProvider
DeleteDataProvider.description: Grants permission to delete the specified data provider

DeleteEndpoint.name: DeleteEndpoint
DeleteEndpoint.description: Grants permission to delete the specified endpoint

DeleteEventSubscription.name: DeleteEventSubscription
DeleteEventSubscription.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS DMS event subscription

DeleteFleetAdvisorCollector.name: DeleteFleetAdvisorCollector
DeleteFleetAdvisorCollector.description: Grants permission to delete the specified Fleet Advisor collector

DeleteFleetAdvisorDatabases.name: DeleteFleetAdvisorDatabases
DeleteFleetAdvisorDatabases.description: Grants permission to delete the specified Fleet Advisor databases

DeleteInstanceProfile.name: DeleteInstanceProfile
DeleteInstanceProfile.description: Grants permission to delete the specified instance profile

DeleteMigrationProject.name: DeleteMigrationProject
DeleteMigrationProject.description: Grants permission to delete the specified migration project

DeleteReplicationConfig.name: DeleteReplicationConfig
DeleteReplicationConfig.description: Grants permission to delete the specified replication config

DeleteReplicationInstance.name: DeleteReplicationInstance
DeleteReplicationInstance.description: Grants permission to delete the specified replication instance

DeleteReplicationSubnetGroup.name: DeleteReplicationSubnetGroup
DeleteReplicationSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to deletes a subnet group

DeleteReplicationTask.name: DeleteReplicationTask
DeleteReplicationTask.description: Grants permission to delete the specified replication task

DeleteReplicationTaskAssessmentRun.name: DeleteReplicationTaskAssessmentRun
DeleteReplicationTaskAssessmentRun.description: Grants permission to delete the record of a single premigration assessment run

DescribeAccountAttributes.name: DescribeAccountAttributes
DescribeAccountAttributes.description: Grants permission to list all of the AWS DMS attributes for a customer account

DescribeApplicableIndividualAssessments.name: DescribeApplicableIndividualAssessments
DescribeApplicableIndividualAssessments.description: Grants permission to list individual assessments that you can specify for a new premigration assessment run

DescribeCertificates.name: DescribeCertificates
DescribeCertificates.description: Grants permission to provide a description of the certificate

DescribeConnections.name: DescribeConnections
DescribeConnections.description: Grants permission to describe the status of the connections that have been made between the replication instance and an endpoint

DescribeConversionConfiguration.name: DescribeConversionConfiguration
DescribeConversionConfiguration.description: Grants permission to return information about DMS Schema Conversion project configuration

DescribeDataMigrations.name: DescribeDataMigrations
DescribeDataMigrations.description: Grants permission to return information about database migrations for your account in the specified region

DescribeDataProviders.name: DescribeDataProviders
DescribeDataProviders.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a data providers. Note. This action should be added along with ListDataProviders, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

DescribeEndpointSettings.name: DescribeEndpointSettings
DescribeEndpointSettings.description: Grants permission to return the possible endpoint settings available when you create an endpoint for a specific database engine

DescribeEndpointTypes.name: DescribeEndpointTypes
DescribeEndpointTypes.description: Grants permission to return information about the type of endpoints available

DescribeEndpoints.name: DescribeEndpoints
DescribeEndpoints.description: Grants permission to return information about the endpoints for your account in the current region

DescribeEngineVersions.name: DescribeEngineVersions
DescribeEngineVersions.description: Grants permission to return information about the available versions for DMS replication instances

DescribeEventCategories.name: DescribeEventCategories
DescribeEventCategories.description: Grants permission to list categories for all event source types, or, if specified, for a specified source type

DescribeEventSubscriptions.name: DescribeEventSubscriptions
DescribeEventSubscriptions.description: Grants permission to list all the event subscriptions for a customer account

DescribeEvents.name: DescribeEvents
DescribeEvents.description: Grants permission to list events for a given source identifier and source type

DescribeExtensionPackAssociations.name: DescribeExtensionPackAssociations
DescribeExtensionPackAssociations.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for extension packs. Note. This action should be added along with ListExtensionPacks, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

DescribeFleetAdvisorCollectors.name: DescribeFleetAdvisorCollectors
DescribeFleetAdvisorCollectors.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of Fleet Advisor collectors in your account based on filter settings

DescribeFleetAdvisorDatabases.name: DescribeFleetAdvisorDatabases
DescribeFleetAdvisorDatabases.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of Fleet Advisor databases in your account based on filter settings

DescribeFleetAdvisorLsaAnalysis.name: DescribeFleetAdvisorLsaAnalysis
DescribeFleetAdvisorLsaAnalysis.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of descriptions of large-scale assessment (LSA) analyses produced by your Fleet Advisor collectors

DescribeFleetAdvisorSchemaObjectSummary.name: DescribeFleetAdvisorSchemaObjectSummary
DescribeFleetAdvisorSchemaObjectSummary.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of descriptions of schemas discovered by your Fleet Advisor collectors based on filter settings

DescribeFleetAdvisorSchemas.name: DescribeFleetAdvisorSchemas
DescribeFleetAdvisorSchemas.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of schemas discovered by your Fleet Advisor collectors based on filter settings

DescribeInstanceProfiles.name: DescribeInstanceProfiles
DescribeInstanceProfiles.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a instance profiles. Note. This action should be added along with ListInstanceProfiles, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

DescribeMetadataModelAssessments.name: DescribeMetadataModelAssessments
DescribeMetadataModelAssessments.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for metadata model assessments. Note. This action should be added along with ListMetadataModelAssessments, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

DescribeMetadataModelConversions.name: DescribeMetadataModelConversions
DescribeMetadataModelConversions.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a metadata model conversions. Note. This action should be added along with ListMetadataModelConversions, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

DescribeMetadataModelExportsAsScript.name: DescribeMetadataModelExportsAsScript
DescribeMetadataModelExportsAsScript.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a metadata model exports. Note. This action should be added along with ListMetadataModelExports, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

DescribeMetadataModelExportsToTarget.name: DescribeMetadataModelExportsToTarget
DescribeMetadataModelExportsToTarget.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a metadata model exports. Note. This action should be added along with ListMetadataModelExports, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

DescribeMetadataModelImports.name: DescribeMetadataModelImports
DescribeMetadataModelImports.description: Grants permission to return information about start metadata model import operations for a migration project

DescribeMigrationProjects.name: DescribeMigrationProjects
DescribeMigrationProjects.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a migration projects. Note. This action should be added along with ListMigrationProjects, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

DescribeOrderableReplicationInstances.name: DescribeOrderableReplicationInstances
DescribeOrderableReplicationInstances.description: Grants permission to return information about the replication instance types that can be created in the specified region

DescribePendingMaintenanceActions.name: DescribePendingMaintenanceActions
DescribePendingMaintenanceActions.description: Grants permission to return information about pending maintenance actions

DescribeRecommendationLimitations.name: DescribeRecommendationLimitations
DescribeRecommendationLimitations.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of descriptions of limitations for recommendations of target AWS engines

DescribeRecommendations.name: DescribeRecommendations
DescribeRecommendations.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of descriptions of target engine recommendations for your source databases

DescribeRefreshSchemasStatus.name: DescribeRefreshSchemasStatus
DescribeRefreshSchemasStatus.description: Grants permission to returns the status of the RefreshSchemas operation

DescribeReplicationConfigs.name: DescribeReplicationConfigs
DescribeReplicationConfigs.description: Grants permission to describe replication configs

DescribeReplicationInstanceTaskLogs.name: DescribeReplicationInstanceTaskLogs
DescribeReplicationInstanceTaskLogs.description: Grants permission to return information about the task logs for the specified task

DescribeReplicationInstances.name: DescribeReplicationInstances
DescribeReplicationInstances.description: Grants permission to return information about replication instances for your account in the current region

DescribeReplicationSubnetGroups.name: DescribeReplicationSubnetGroups
DescribeReplicationSubnetGroups.description: Grants permission to return information about the replication subnet groups

DescribeReplicationTableStatistics.name: DescribeReplicationTableStatistics
DescribeReplicationTableStatistics.description: Grants permission to describe replication table statistics

DescribeReplicationTaskAssessmentResults.name: DescribeReplicationTaskAssessmentResults
DescribeReplicationTaskAssessmentResults.description: Grants permission to return the latest task assessment results from Amazon S3

DescribeReplicationTaskAssessmentRuns.name: DescribeReplicationTaskAssessmentRuns
DescribeReplicationTaskAssessmentRuns.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of premigration assessment runs based on filter settings

DescribeReplicationTaskIndividualAssessm.name: DescribeReplicationTaskIndividualAssessments
DescribeReplicationTaskIndividualAssessm.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of individual assessments based on filter settings

DescribeReplicationTasks.name: DescribeReplicationTasks
DescribeReplicationTasks.description: Grants permission to return information about replication tasks for your account in the current region

DescribeSchemas.name: DescribeSchemas
DescribeSchemas.description: Grants permission to return information about the schema for the specified endpoint

DescribeTableStatistics.name: DescribeTableStatistics
DescribeTableStatistics.description: Grants permission to return table statistics on the database migration task, including table name, rows inserted, rows updated, and rows deleted

DisassociateExtensionPack.name: DisassociateExtensionPack
DisassociateExtensionPack.description: Grants permission to disassociate a extension pack

ExportMetadataModelAssessment.name: ExportMetadataModelAssessment
ExportMetadataModelAssessment.description: Grants permission to export the specified metadata model assessment

GetMetadataModel.name: GetMetadataModel
GetMetadataModel.description: Grants permission to list all of the AWS DMS attributes for a metadata model. Note. Despite this action requires StartMetadataModelImport, the latter does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

ImportCertificate.name: ImportCertificate
ImportCertificate.description: Grants permission to upload the specified certificate

ListDataProviders.name: ListDataProviders
ListDataProviders.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a data providers

ListExtensionPacks.name: ListExtensionPacks
ListExtensionPacks.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a extension packs

ListInstanceProfiles.name: ListInstanceProfiles
ListInstanceProfiles.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a instance profiles

ListMetadataModelAssessmentActionItems.name: ListMetadataModelAssessmentActionItems
ListMetadataModelAssessmentActionItems.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a metadata model assessment action items. Note. Despite this action requires StartMetadataModelImport, the latter does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

ListMetadataModelAssessments.name: ListMetadataModelAssessments
ListMetadataModelAssessments.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a metadata model assessments

ListMetadataModelConversions.name: ListMetadataModelConversions
ListMetadataModelConversions.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a metadata model conversions

ListMetadataModelExports.name: ListMetadataModelExports
ListMetadataModelExports.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a metadata model exports

ListMigrationProjects.name: ListMigrationProjects
ListMigrationProjects.description: Grants permission to list the AWS DMS attributes for a migration projects. Note. Despite this action requires DescribeMigrationProjects and DescribeConversionConfiguration, both required actions do not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list all tags for an AWS DMS resource

ModifyConversionConfiguration.name: ModifyConversionConfiguration
ModifyConversionConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update a conversion configuration. Note. This action should be added along with UpdateConversionConfiguration, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

ModifyDataMigration.name: ModifyDataMigration
ModifyDataMigration.description: Grants permission to modify the specified database migration

ModifyDataProvider.name: ModifyDataProvider
ModifyDataProvider.description: Grants permission to modify the specified data provider. Note. This action should be added along with UpdateDataProvider, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

ModifyEndpoint.name: ModifyEndpoint
ModifyEndpoint.description: Grants permission to modify the specified endpoint

ModifyEventSubscription.name: ModifyEventSubscription
ModifyEventSubscription.description: Grants permission to modify an existing AWS DMS event notification subscription

ModifyFleetAdvisorCollector.name: ModifyFleetAdvisorCollector
ModifyFleetAdvisorCollector.description: Grants permission to modify the name and description of the specified Fleet Advisor collector

ModifyFleetAdvisorCollectorStatuses.name: ModifyFleetAdvisorCollectorStatuses
ModifyFleetAdvisorCollectorStatuses.description: Grants permission to modify the status of the specified Fleet Advisor collector

ModifyInstanceProfile.name: ModifyInstanceProfile
ModifyInstanceProfile.description: Grants permission to modify the specified instance profile. Note. This action should be added along with UpdateInstanceProfile, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

ModifyMigrationProject.name: ModifyMigrationProject
ModifyMigrationProject.description: Grants permission to modify the specified migration project. Note. This action should be added along with UpdateMigrationProject, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

ModifyReplicationConfig.name: ModifyReplicationConfig
ModifyReplicationConfig.description: Grants permission to modify the specified replication config

ModifyReplicationInstance.name: ModifyReplicationInstance
ModifyReplicationInstance.description: Grants permission to modify the replication instance to apply new settings

ModifyReplicationSubnetGroup.name: ModifyReplicationSubnetGroup
ModifyReplicationSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to modify the settings for the specified replication subnet group

ModifyReplicationTask.name: ModifyReplicationTask
ModifyReplicationTask.description: Grants permission to modify the specified replication task

MoveReplicationTask.name: MoveReplicationTask
MoveReplicationTask.description: Grants permission to move the specified replication task to a different replication instance

RebootReplicationInstance.name: RebootReplicationInstance
RebootReplicationInstance.description: Grants permission to reboot a replication instance. Rebooting results in a momentary outage, until the replication instance becomes available again

RefreshSchemas.name: RefreshSchemas
RefreshSchemas.description: Grants permission to populate the schema for the specified endpoint

ReloadReplicationTables.name: ReloadReplicationTables
ReloadReplicationTables.description: Grants permission to reload the target database table with the source for a replication

ReloadTables.name: ReloadTables
ReloadTables.description: Grants permission to reload the target database table with the source data

RemoveTagsFromResource.name: RemoveTagsFromResource
RemoveTagsFromResource.description: Grants permission to remove metadata tags from a DMS resource

RunFleetAdvisorLsaAnalysis.name: RunFleetAdvisorLsaAnalysis
RunFleetAdvisorLsaAnalysis.description: Grants permission to run a large-scale assessment (LSA) analysis on every Fleet Advisor collector in your account

StartDataMigration.name: StartDataMigration
StartDataMigration.description: Grants permission to start the database migration

StartExtensionPackAssociation.name: StartExtensionPackAssociation
StartExtensionPackAssociation.description: Grants permission to associate an extension pack. Note. This action should be added along with AssociateExtensionPack, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

StartMetadataModelAssessment.name: StartMetadataModelAssessment
StartMetadataModelAssessment.description: Grants permission to start a new assessment of metadata model

StartMetadataModelConversion.name: StartMetadataModelConversion
StartMetadataModelConversion.description: Grants permission to start a new conversion of metadata model

StartMetadataModelExportAsScript.name: StartMetadataModelExportAsScript
StartMetadataModelExportAsScript.description: Grants permission to start a new export of metadata model as script. Note. This action should be added along with StartMetadataModelExportAsScripts, but does not currently authorize the described Schema Conversion operation

StartMetadataModelExportAsScripts.name: StartMetadataModelExportAsScripts
StartMetadataModelExportAsScripts.description: Grants permission to start a new export of metadata model as script

StartMetadataModelExportToTarget.name: StartMetadataModelExportToTarget
StartMetadataModelExportToTarget.description: Grants permission to start a new export of metadata model to target

StartMetadataModelImport.name: StartMetadataModelImport
StartMetadataModelImport.description: Grants permission to start a new import of metadata model

StartRecommendations.name: StartRecommendations
StartRecommendations.description: Grants permission to start the analysis of your source database to provide recommendations of target engines

StartReplication.name: StartReplication
StartReplication.description: Grants permission to start a replication

StartReplicationTask.name: StartReplicationTask
StartReplicationTask.description: Grants permission to start the replication task

StartReplicationTaskAssessment.name: StartReplicationTaskAssessment
StartReplicationTaskAssessment.description: Grants permission to start the replication task assessment for unsupported data types in the source database

StartReplicationTaskAssessmentRun.name: StartReplicationTaskAssessmentRun
StartReplicationTaskAssessmentRun.description: Grants permission to start a new premigration assessment run for one or more individual assessments of a migration task

StopDataMigration.name: StopDataMigration
StopDataMigration.description: Grants permission to stop the database migration

StopReplication.name: StopReplication
StopReplication.description: Grants permission to stop a replication

StopReplicationTask.name: StopReplicationTask
StopReplicationTask.description: Grants permission to stop the replication task

TestConnection.name: TestConnection
TestConnection.description: Grants permission to test the connection between the replication instance and the endpoint

UpdateConversionConfiguration.name: UpdateConversionConfiguration
UpdateConversionConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update a conversion configuration

UpdateDataProvider.name: UpdateDataProvider
UpdateDataProvider.description: Grants permission to update the specified data provider

UpdateInstanceProfile.name: UpdateInstanceProfile
UpdateInstanceProfile.description: Grants permission to update the specified instance profile

UpdateMigrationProject.name: UpdateMigrationProject
UpdateMigrationProject.description: Grants permission to update the specified migration project

UpdateSubscriptionsToEventBridge.name: UpdateSubscriptionsToEventBridge
UpdateSubscriptionsToEventBridge.description: Grants permission to migrate DMS subcriptions to Eventbridge

UploadFileMetadataList.name: UploadFileMetadataList
UploadFileMetadataList.description: Grants permission to upload files to your Amazon S3 bucket
